20110121010029.000|20110121010031.000|CC1|CAN GET IN TRACKING HIM DOWN.

20110121010037.000|20110121010039.000|CC1|WAS RUSHED TO A HOSPITAL AFTER  
20110121010039.000|20110121010041.000|CC1|BEING SHOT IN THE CHEST.
